info.name: visualize_labels
info.description: A module for visualizing labeled videos

inputs.name: video_labels_path
inputs.description: A JSON file containing the video labels

inputs.name: objects_path
inputs.description: A JSON file containing the detected objects

parameters.name: annotation_config
parameters.description: an eta.core.annotations.AnnotationConfig describing how to render the annotations on the video. If omitted, the default settings are used
